get.description:
Get the detail of all function sub-account

|Code|Description|Usage|
|--------|--------|----|
|1|coupon account| fund in this account can be transfered to member account for marketing purpose |
|2|commission account| fund belonged to platform will be deposited into this account |

functional-sub-account.title: Function Sub-Account
functional-sub-account.description: Functional sub-accounts created by default by Lianlian Pay bank partner

accountType.description:
Account Type, one of

|Code|Description|
|--------|--------|
|1|coupon account|
|2|commission account|

availableBalance.description: Account balances that can payout, less than or equal to `totalBalance`
